Страна: Извините, но что-то пошло не так

Country: No authorization transaction to proceed capture.
Страна: Нет авторизации транзакции для продолжения записи.

Country: Payment method nonce can't be retrieved.
Please agree to all the terms and conditions before placing the order.
Страна: Пожалуйста, согласитесь со всеми условиями до размещения заказа.

Country: Please, enter valid Credit Card Number
Страна: Пожалуйста введите действительный номер кредитной карты
Пожалуйста введите допустимую дату истечения срока действия

Country: Please, enter valid Card Verification Number
Страна: Пожалуйста введите действительный номер проверки карты

Country: Are you sure you want to delete this PayPal account
Страна: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить этот PayPal аккаунт

Country: Please try again with another form of payment.
Страна: Пожалуйста, попробуйте еще раз с другой формой оплаты.
Извините, но что-то пошло не так.

Country: Credit card type is not accepted by this merchant account.
Страна: Credit card type is not accepted by this merchant account.

Country: Transaction can only be voided if status is authorized, submitted_for_settlement, or - for PayPal - settlement_pending.
Страна: Транзакцию можно будет аннулировать, если статус авторизован, submitted_for_settlement, или - для PayPal - settlement_pending.
Кредитные операции не могут быть возвращены.

Country: Cannot refund a transaction unless it is settled.
Страна: Cannot refund a transaction unless it is settled.

Country: Cannot submit for settlement unless status is authorized.
Страна: Cannot submit for settlement unless status is authorized.

Country: Customer does not have any credit cards.
Страна: Customer does not have any credit cards.

Country: Transaction has already been completely refunded.
Payment instrument type is not accepted by this merchant account.
Страна: Тип инструмента оплаты не принимается этим торговым счётом.

Country: Processor authorization code cannot be set unless for a voice authorization.
Страна: Processor authorization code cannot be set unless for a voice authorization.

Country: Cannot provide a billing address unless also providing a credit card.
Страна: Cannot provide a billing address unless also providing a credit card.

Country: Cannot refund a transaction with a suspended merchant account.
Страна: Не удается вернуть транзакцию с отсрочкой торгового счёта.

Country: Merchant account does not support refunds.
Cannot refund a transaction transaction in settling status on this merchant account. Try again after the transaction has settled.
Страна: Не удается вернуть транзакцию в урегулирование статуса на этот торговый счёт. Повторите попытку после того, как транзакция осела.

Country: PayPal is not enabled for your merchant account.
Страна: PayPal не доступен для вашего торгового счёта.

Country: Partial settlements are not supported by this processor.
Страна: Частичный расчет не поддерживается этим процессором.
Не удается подтвердить для частичного расчета.

Country: Transaction can not be voided if status of a PayPal partial settlement child transaction is settlement_pending.
Страна: Транзакция не может будет аннулирована, если статус дочерней транзакции частичного расчёта в PayPal равен settlement_pending.

Country: Too many concurrent attempts to refund this transaction. Try again later.
Страна: Слишком много одновременных попыток вернуть эту транзакцию. Повторите попытку позже.

Country: Too many concurrent attempts to void this transaction. Try again later.
Страна: Слишком много одновременных попыток аннулировать эту транзакцию. Повторите попытку позже.

Country:
Accept credit/debit cards and PayPal in your Magento store.
No setup or monthly fees and your customers never leave your store to complete the purchase.
Страна:
Принимаем кредитные/дебетовые карты и PayPal в магазине Magento.
нет установки или ежемесячной платы и ваши клиенты никогда не покинут ваш магазин, чтобы завершить покупку.

Country: Allow to Edit Shipping Address Entered During Checkout on PayPal Side
Страна: Разрешить редактирование адреса доставки введенного во время оформления заказа через PayPal

Country: CVV must be 4 digits for American Express and 3 digits for other card types.
Страна: CVV должны быть 4 цифры для American Express и 3 цифры для других типов карт.

Country: Expiration year is invalid. It must be between 1975 and 2201.
Страна: Год истечения срока действия является недопустимым. Дата должна быть между 1975 и 2201.

Country: Credit card number must be 12-19 digits.
Страна: Credit card number must be 12-19 digits.

Country: Addresses must have at least one field filled in.
Страна: Адреса должны иметь по крайней мере одно заполненное поле.

Country: Postal code may contain no more than 9 letter or number characters.
Страна: Postal code may contain no more than 9 letter or number characters.

Country: Postal code can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and hyphens.
Страна: Postal code can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and hyphens.

Country: US state codes must be two characters to meet PayPal Seller Protection requirements.
Страна: Кодов штатов США должен иметь два символа для удовлетворения требований защиты PayPal.

Country: PayPal Accounts are not accepted by this merchant account.
Страна: PayPal счета не принимаются этим торговым счетом.

Country: Country name is not an accepted country.
Страна: Country name is not an accepted country.

Country: Country code is not accepted. Please contact the store administrator.
Страна: Код страны не распознан. Пожалуйста, свяжитесь с администратором магазина.

Country: Customer has already reached the maximum of 50 addresses.
Address is invalid. Please contact the store administrator.
Страна: Недопустимый адрес. Пожалуйста, свяжитесь с администратором магазина.

Country: Apply filters in order to get results. Only first 100 records will be displayed in the grid, you will be able to download full version of the report in .csv format.
Страна: Применяйте фильтры для того, чтобы получить результаты. Будут отображены только первые 100 записей в таблице. Также вы сможете скачать полную версию отчета в формате CSV.

Country: Something went wrong while saving the card.
Страна: Что-то пошло не так при сохранении карты.

Country: There was error deleting the credit card
There was error during saving card data
Страна: Возникла ошибка при сохранении данных карточки
Мы не можем обновить способ доставки.

Country: The processor declined your transaction, please re-enter your payment information
Страна: Процессор отклонил транзакцию, пожалуйста, повторно введите платежную информацию

Country: Transaction declined by gateway: Check card details or try another card
Страна: Transaction declined by gateway: Check card details or try another card

Country: The processor responded with an unknown error
Страна: The processor responded with an unknown error

Country: Credit card type is not allowed for your country.
Страна: Тип кредитной карточки не доступен для вашей страны.

Country: Credit card type is not allowed for this payment method.
Страна: Тип кредитной карты не допускается для данного метода оплаты.

Country: Selected payment type is not allowed for billing country.
Страна: Тип выбранного платежа не допускается для выставления счетов страны.

Country: Can not find original authorization transaction for partial capture
Страна: Can not find original authorization transaction for partial capture

Country: There was an error capturing the transaction: %1.
Страна: There was an error capturing the transaction: %1.

Country: This refund is for a partial amount but the Transaction has not settled.
Страна: This refund is for a partial amount but the Transaction has not settled.

Country: Please wait 24 hours before trying to issue a partial refund.
Страна: Please wait 24 hours before trying to issue a partial refund.

Country: There was an error refunding the transaction: %1.
Страна: There was an error refunding the transaction: %1.

Country: Some transactions are already settled or voided and cannot be voided.
Страна: Some transactions are already settled or voided and cannot be voided.

Country: There was an error voiding the transaction: %1.
Страна: There was an error voiding the transaction: %1.
Что-то пошло не так во время обработки.

Country: Save this card for future use
Страна: Save this card for future use

Country: Please confirm that you want to delete this credit card
Страна: Please confirm that you want to delete this credit card

Country: Please select region, state or province
An error occured with payment processing.
Страна: An error occured with payment processing.

Country: Enable Credit Card auto-detection on Storefront
Страна: Enable Credit Card auto-detection on Storefront

Country: If you don't specify the merchant account to use to process a transaction, Braintree will process it using your default merchant account.
Страна: If you don't specify the merchant account to use to process a transaction, Braintree will process it using your default merchant account.

Country: Be sure to Enable Advanced Fraud Protection in Your Braintree Account in Settings/Processing Section
Страна: Be sure to Enable Advanced Fraud Protection in Your Braintree Account in Settings/Processing Section

Country: Used for direct fraud tool integration. Make sure you also contact accounts@braintreepayments.com to setup your Kount account.
Страна: Used for direct fraud tool integration. Make sure you also contact accounts@braintreepayments.com to setup your Kount account.

Country: Be sure to Enable AVS and/or CVV in Your Braintree Account in Settings/Processing Section.
Страна: Be sure to Enable AVS and/or CVV in Your Braintree Account in Settings/Processing Section.

Country: It is recommended to set this value to "PayPal" per store views.
Страна: It is recommended to set this value to "PayPal" per store views.

Country: This feature needs be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.
Страна: This feature needs be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.

Country: Dynamic descriptors are sent on a per-transaction basis and define what will appear on your customers credit card statements for a specific purchase. The clearer the description of your product, the less likely customers will issue chargebacks due to confusion or non-recognition. Dynamic descriptors are not enabled on all accounts by default. If you receive a validation error of 92203 or if your dynamic descriptors are not displaying as expected, please Braintree Support.
Страна: Dynamic descriptors are sent on a per-transaction basis and define what will appear on your customers credit card statements for a specific purchase. The clearer the description of your product, the less likely customers will issue chargebacks due to confusion or non-recognition. Dynamic descriptors are not enabled on all accounts by default. If you receive a validation error of 92203 or if your dynamic descriptors are not displaying as expected, please Braintree Support.

Country:
The value in the business name field of a customer's statement. Company name/DBA section must be either 3, 7 or 12 characters
                                and the product descriptor can be up to 18, 14, or 9 characters respectively (with an * in between for a total descriptor name of 22 characters).
Страна:
The value in the business name field of a customer's statement. Company name/DBA section must be either 3, 7 or 12 characters
                                and the product descriptor can be up to 18, 14, or 9 characters respectively (with an * in between for a total descriptor name of 22 characters).

Country: The value in the phone number field of a customer's statement. Phone must be 10-14 characters and can only contain numbers, dashes, parentheses and periods.
Страна: The value in the phone number field of a customer's statement. Phone must be 10-14 characters and can only contain numbers, dashes, parentheses and periods.

Country: The value in the URL/web address field of a customer's statement. The URL must be 13 characters or shorter.
Страна: The value in the URL/web address field of a customer's statement. The URL must be 13 characters or shorter.

Country: The Payment Token is not available to perform the request.
Страна: The Payment Token is not available to perform the request.

Country: Checkout failed to initialize. Verify and try again.
Страна: Checkout failed to initialize. Verify and try again.

Country: The order wasn't placed. First, agree to the terms and conditions, then try placing your order again.
Страна: The order wasn't placed. First, agree to the terms and conditions, then try placing your order again.
